verbose_text: The de novo production of adult hemoglobin (HbA) can be achieved in beta 0 -thalassemias by gene therapy and gene correction, by homologous recombination and/or by the treatment of erythroid cells with molecules causing read-through.
evidence: hemoglobin (HbA) can be achieved in beta 0 -thalassemias by gene therapy                           and gene correction, by homologous recombination                           and/or by the treatment of erythroid cells with molecules causing read-through
